item.title: Sazerac
item.description: Ingredients 60 ml Rye whisky 5 ml Sugar syrup 4 dashes Creole bitters 4 dashes Absinthe lemon twist Instructions (Optional) rinse glass with absinthe. Stirred. Serve in a rocks glass without ice. Garnish with a lemon twist.
